title: Regenerate and add missing favicon assets so the favicon displays

requirements.text: Add the missing favicon image files referenced by frontend/index.html under frontend/public/assets/generated so the browser can load and display the favicon.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist at build time in frontend/public/assets/generated: favicon-16.dim_16x16.png, favicon-32.dim_32x32.png, apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png, android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png.
Running the app serves the favicon assets at /assets/generated/<filename> without 404s.
Opening the deployed app in a fresh/incognito browser session shows the favicon in the tab (and the Apple touch icon is discoverable via the link tag).

requirements.text: Ensure the generated favicon images visually match the appâ€™s existing heart icon style (a centered pink heart on a white circular background) across all required favicon sizes.

quotes: I'm not seeing a favicon with my app.
The favicon is still not showing up.

acceptanceCriteria: All generated favicon images depict a centered pink heart on a white circular background.
The heart remains recognizable and centered at 16x16 and 32x32 sizes (no cropping).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
Do not modify the Internet Identity hooks in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts (immutable paths).
Do not introduce any backend changes; this fix is limited to static frontend assets.
nonGoals: Adding dark mode or other UI/theme changes beyond what is required for the favicon assets to render.
Changing the existing favicon <link> tags in frontend/index.html unless it is required to match the regenerated asset filenames.

required: Centered pink heart on a white circular background (favicon-16.dim_16x16.png, 16x16)
Centered pink heart on a white circular background (favicon-32.dim_32x32.png, 32x32)
Centered pink heart on a white circular background (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, 180x180)
Centered pink heart on a white circular background (android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png, 192x192)
Centered pink heart on a white circular background (android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png, 512x512)
